statements: DELETE FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-07-15' AND doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
DELETE FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-11-15' AND doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM scheduling_and_appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND appointment_time = '15:30:00' AND patient_id = 12345;
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1001 AND patient_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_id = 101 AND prescription LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
